I am Amy! Empress! Ruler! Goddess!" you tell the camera man before slipping off your shoe and squashing the man into a tiny bloody pulp.

Looking around, you decide to
1142.title: Change everyone elses size

13.content: You decide to go test your powers at the mall. The question is where in the mall?
13.title: The mall

132.content: You walk into a new store in the mall that sells plus-size clothing, and you see that there is a girl about your age who looks like she's about 5'5" and 230lbs, you also see she appears to have a friend with her who is about 5'10" 130lbs. Then you see some cute clothes on the racks and think maybe you should pick out someclothes and grow into them. Who will you grow first?
132.title: A plus-size clothing store

1322.content: You notice how close she is to the fat girl, but you can't really figure out her expression, whether it was disgust or envy of her friends soft body. But you have a way to find out...
1322.title: The thin friend of hers

13221.content: You begin to think of her getting fatter. At first her butt and thighs begin expanding, stretching her tight jeans to the limit. Then her breasts started growing larger, soon joined by her belly, her once flat stomach is now soft and round with fat. When you stop her growth she is about 220lbs and she is shocked. But soon after...
13221.title: Grow Her First, Ask Questions Later

choices: A thin, popular girl shoves into you
You go over to talk to the girl you just fattened up
132211.content: She started smiling after her shockingly fast weight gain. The she started to laugh, jiggling her fat belly. She ran over to the food court with her fat friend and began to eat fattening foods. Your powers to make people gain weight also make them happy about their gain and make them want to gain more. Then...
132211.title: She smiles and laughs

1322111.content:
"Watch where you're going", a blonde girl who's about 5'2" and 95lbs tells you as she and one of her friends run into you.

"Excuse me", you ask.

"Maybe you should go join that tub of lard that you were staring at", her friend who is also blonde and about 5'4" and 100lbs snaps.

'Maybe I should teach these two girls a lesson', you think to yourself...
1322111.title: A thin, popular girl shoves into you

choices: Fatten These Two Up Right Now!
Shrink Them And Take Them Home With You
13221111.content: 'Should I fatten them up right here, or should I shrink them and take them somewhere private...
13221111.title: Change their size

132211112.content: You decide not to make a scene here and follow the two of them to the bathroom, where you shrink them both to 2 inches tall. You gently grab a hold of them and put them in your purse. You plan on having fun with these two later...
132211112.title: Shrink Them And Take Them Home With You

13221112.content: Amy starts to imagine herself as a powerful giantess. She feels her skin stretch as she swells her girlish figure to 6'5" and 400 lbs. Staring in awe, the two girls were frozen still. Amy grabs them by their scruffs like a mother wolf and whispers. You two are coming with me!!! The snobby girls put up no resistance and let Amy march them into the nearest dressing room. Amy effortlessly takes both of them in a bear hug, and begins to squeeze. The smaller girls faces turned beet red as Amy made it impossible to breathe. She felt their backs crackle like a trip to the chiropractor as she tightened her grip a little more. Both of the smaller girls swooned and finally went limp from breath deprivation. Amy arranged them neatly side by side on the floor. Amy again imagined herself larger, but this time she only grew fatter. She fattened up past 600, 700, 800, 900 pounds! Even with her amazonic height, she was fat and round. Amy gently straddled the small girls as they began to awaken. Amy faced their feet and lowered her gargantuan ass over the girls' faces. Supporting her weight on her knees, Amy could control the squashing she was dealing out. One of the girls began to scream, but was quickly silenced by one of Amy's butt cheeks. It covered her face, arms, and upper torso to her waist. Amy applied equal pressure to the other girl and pressed them both to the floor. All she could feel was the muffled yelps of her helpless victims for a split second before they were squashed below her. Amy sat for several seconds like this before rocking forward slightly so they could breathe again. The girls gasped a single breath before Amy squashed them again for 15 seconds. She repeated this 5 or 6 times with the squashing lasting longer each time. After the sixth time, she leaned forward but heard no gasping. They were both out cold. One last devious thought crossed Amy's mind. She started to think about her victims shrinking, and they were reduced to the size of Barbie dolls. Amy carefully picked them up and placed them in her bra under her ample fat breasts. The girls were pinned by breasts which easily outweighed them six to one. Laughing a devilish laugh, Amy started doing jumping jacks, her monsterous breasts crashing down on her victims like an avalanche. Amy counted to a hundred jumps before she released her bra clasps to see her handywork. The formerly snotty girls were again unconscious, and much worse for wear. Their flattened frames fell limp into the cups of their giantess captor's brassiere. Amy refastened her bra with the girls still in the cups, and made her way out of the mall to her car.
13221112.title: Change your size

info.brief_description: Amy can control her size and everyone elses too, how will she use her power?
info.description:
This story is about a young woman named Amy who has been given the power to control her size, along with everyone elses. This story should stick around female weight gain and gts, try to avoid male growth. Girl/Girl is fine in this story, just no guy/guy.

Amy: 20 years old, normal size - 5'6" 135lbs, bi
